def_cn: 彻底调整，重组，改革(组织、机构、行业等)
def_en: See also:shake-up; If someone shakes up something such as an organization, an institution, or a profession, they make major changes to it.

def_cn: 使震动;使激动;使心烦意乱
def_en: If you are shaken up or shook up by an unpleasant experience, it makes you feel shocked and upset, and unable to think calmly or clearly.
